meanings.definition: The amount of time during which a computer or other machine is continuously operational.
meanings.sent1: The uptime of the computer was impressive, as it ran without any breaks.
meanings.sent2: The technician monitored the server's uptime to ensure smooth operation.
meanings.sent3: The computer's uptime was so good, it seemed like it never needed a nap!
meanings.sent4: The uptime of the machine was like a marathon runner, never stopping for rest.
meanings.sent5: The uptime of the device was like a shining beacon of reliability.

meanings.definition: The time during which a system or service is available for use.
meanings.sent1: The online game's uptime allowed players to enjoy it without interruptions.
meanings.sent2: The company's website had excellent uptime, attracting more customers.
meanings.sent3: The service's uptime was so good, it felt like it was always ready to party!
meanings.sent4: The uptime of the system was a lifeline for users, always there when needed.
meanings.sent5: The uptime of the platform was like a dependable friend, never letting you down.
